api-error-messages.bad-request-error: The information input is not in the correct format.
api-error-messages.internal-server-error: The service is temporarily unavailable. Please try again later.
api-error-messages.login-unauthorized-error: Wrong email address, username and/or password.

application.description: Pix is an online platform for the assessment and certification of the digital skills of French-speaking citizens (pupils, students, dropouts, job seekers, seniors)

form.mandatory-fields: Fields marked with '<abbr title="mandatory" class="mandatory-mark">'*'</abbr>' are mandatory

errors.not-accessible: Oups, the requested page is not accessible.
errors.no-longer-accessible: Oups, the requested page is no longer accessible.

assessment.title: Start your journey
assessment.announcement:
Start your personalized assessment path.
Register or log into the Pix platform and start your test.
assessment.details: During this course, you will have the opportunity to:
assessment.legal: Information relating to your progress will be sent to the course organizer to enable him to accompany you.

evaluate.title: Measure your digital skills with fun tests on different topics such as:
evaluate.complement: The public digital skills assessment and certification service Pix allows you to assess your level in 5 major skill areas, which cover all current digital uses.
evaluate.list:
'
  • 'search the internet for information,'
  • 'write documents,'
  • 'communicate and collaborate online,'
  • 'secure your working environment,'
  • 'etc.'
'

certify.title: Prepare for certification recognized by the State and the professional world
certify.description: The Pix certification allows you to promote your digital skills to employers.

develop.title: Discover your results during the test and consult clues to progress.
develop.description: After 5 tests, you can view your answers and follow tutorials to develop your skills.

profiles-collection.title: Submit your profile
profiles-collection.announcement: Register or log in to the Pix platform and send your profile to the recipient organization.
profiles-collection.legal: Information relating to your PIX profile will be sent to the organizer to enable him to accompany you.

verification-code.title: Verification code
verification-code.tooltip: Communiquez ce code pour permettre à un tiers de vérifier l'authenticité de votre certificat

competences.informations: Your certified score was calculated based on your answers during the certification process. It can therefore differ from the number of Pix displayed in your profile. On the day of your certification it was possible to reach level 5 skills and 640 pix maximum.
competences.subtitle: (level on 5)
competences.title: Certified skills

header.not-bad-subtitle: Encore quelques petits efforts et vous décrocherez le premier niveau.
header.too-bad-subtitle: Manifestement, ce n’est pas votre jour mais vous ferez mieux la prochaine fois.

certification-not-certifiable.title: Votre profil n'est pas encore certifiable.
certification-not-certifiable.text: Pour faire certifier votre profil, vous devez avoir obtenu un niveau supérieur à 0 dans 5 compétences minimum.

finished.title: Bravo, c'est fini !
finished.description: Vos résultats seront prochainement disponibles depuis votre compte.
finished.warning-text: Si cet ordinateur n’est pas le vôtre, pensez à vous déconnecter.

not-finished.title: Vous avez presque terminé
not-finished.supervisor:
Appelez le surveillant : '
'Il doit impérativement voir cet écran pour finaliser votre certification.
not-finished.warning-text: Le surveillant a bien vu cet écran.

certification-start.title: Join a certification session
certification-start.access-code: Enter the access code communicated by the supervisor

contact.info: In accordance with the  IT and freedom law, you can exercise your right of access to data concerning you and have them rectified by sending an email to

cgu.info: By clicking on " Start my test ", I accept that my identity data, the certification number and the circumstances of the test as informed by the supervisor are communicated to Pix. Pix will use them during the jury's deliberation to produce and archive my results and to edit my certificate. If this certification has been prescribed by an organization, I accept that Pix will communicate my results to it.

certification-start.first-title: You will start your certification test

no-certification.text: Vous n'avez pas encore de certification.

feedback-panel.description: Pour signaler un problème, appelez votre surveillant et communiquez-lui les informations suivantes :
feedback-panel.certification-number: votre n° de certification (en haut à droite de l'écran)
feedback-panel.question-number: le numéro de la question (en haut à droite de l'écran)

feedback-panel.description: Pix is listening to your advices!*

options.answer-not-accepted: My answer is correct but has not been accepted

lost.label: I can't find the downloaded file
lost.solution: The file is saved under “Téléchargements” or “Downloads” by default. It could also be saved at the same place than your last download...

edit-failure.label: I can't edit the file
edit-failure.solution: The file may be in “read only”

embed-not-displayed.label: The embed is not displayed
embed-not-displayed.solution: Maybe a problem with internet connection

options.other-challenge-proposal: I have a great challenge to propose
options.other-site-improvement: I have a inprovement to propose
options.question-improvement: I have a question improvement to propose
options.picture-not-displayed: Maybe a problem with internet connection

information.data-usage:
'

'Collected data are used to monitor challenge difficulty. You can modify any information by contacting ''dpo@pix.fr''.'

'Click here for more informations'

'
information.guidance:
'

'Don't include any personnal information.'

'

actions.choose-type: Select the type of file you want to use

file-download.description: Pix lets you chose the file format to download. If you don't know which option to chose, just keep the default choice. It corresponds to format that is compatible with most pieces of software.

skip-error-message.qcm: Choose at least one answer to validate. Skip otherwise.
skip-error-message.qcu: Choose an answer to validate. Skip otherwise.
skip-error-message.qroc: Fill in the answer fields to validate. Skip otherwise.
skip-error-message.qroc-auto-reply: The challenge is not successful. Try again or skip.
skip-error-message.qrocm: Fill in all the answer fields to validate. Skip otherwise.

already-finished.explanation: You already answered all the questions during your previous courses. You can directly access your results.
already-finished.info: It's already finished but don't be confused!

completion-percentage.label:
'

'You completed '

'{completionPercentage}%'

' of your course'

'
completion-percentage.caption: assessment progress

comparison-window.upcoming-tutorials: Right here, you will soon be able to find tutorials to do well this kind of assessments!!

ko.title: You do not have the correct answer

aband.title: You did not give any answer

koAutoReply.title: You did not succeed the challenge

description.countdown: { daysBeforeImproving, plural, =0 {0 day.} =1 {1 day.} other {# days.} }

improve.improvingText: Try to get to the next level!

reset.description:

reset.label: Reset

modal.important-message: Your { earnedPix } Pix are going to be deleted.
modal.important-message-above-level-one: Your {level} level and {earnedPix} Pix will be deleted.
modal.title: Reset competence
modal.warning: Please note: if you have an evaluation course in progress, some questions may be asked.

tutorials.title: Cultivate your skills
tutorials.description: Here is a selection of tutorials that can help you earn Pix

actions.back-sign-in: Retour à la page de connexion

error.message: Cette adresse e-mail ne correspond à aucun compte

password-reset-demand.subtitle: Entrez votre adresse e-mail ci-dessous, et c'est repartix

succeed.help: Si vous ne recevez pas cet e-mail, vérifiez vos courriers indésirables.

Un e-mail contenant la démarche à suivre afin de réinitialiser votre mot de passe
 vous a été envoyé à l’adresse e-mail {email}.

profile.title: Your profile
profile.first-title:
You have 16 competences. '
'Be focus and go!

resume-campaign-banner.reminder-continue-campaign: You have not finished the campaign
resume-campaign-banner.reminder-continue-campaign-with-title: You have not finished the campaign "{title}"
resume-campaign-banner.reminder-send-campaign: You have not send the result of the campaign
resume-campaign-banner.reminder-send-campaign-with-title: You have not send the result of "{title}"

total-score-helper.title: Why 1024 pix?
total-score-helper.explanation:
This is the maximum number of pix that we can reach when the 8 levels of the Pix repository are available.'
'Today, ''the maximum is 640 pix'', corresponding to level 5.

profile-already-shared.title: Profile already sent
profile-already-shared.first-title: Everything does not go as planned
profile-already-shared.explanation:
You have already sent the profile below to the organization {organization} '
' on {date,date,LL} at {hour,time,hhmm}

reset-password.title: Changer mon mot de passe
reset-password.error: Nous sommes désolés, mais votre demande de réinitialisation de mot de passe a déjà été utilisée ou est expirée. Merci de recommencer.
reset-password.instruction: Saisissez votre nouveau mot de passe
reset-password.succeed: Votre mot de passe a été modifié avec succès.

answer.qcu: The answer to the question is :

send-profile.title: Send my profile

errors.archived: Sending your profile is no longer possible because the organizer has archived the collection of profiles.

form.info: This sending is only possible once
form.shared: Thank you, your profile has been sent!

send-profile.instructions:
You will transmit the score and skill levels present on your Pix profile.
Any changes to your profile after this submission will not be transmitted.
Remember to check it before sending it!

subtitle.text: Don't have a Pix account yet?

sign-up.title: Sign up

cgu.error: Please accept terms of service before you sign up
cgu.label: '<abbr title="mandatory">'*'</abbr>' I accept

password.error: Password should have 8 characters, one uppercase and lowercase letter and one number at least.
password.help: (8 char min, with uppercase, lowercase and a number)
password.label: Password

sign-up.instructions: Fields marked with '<abbr title="mandatory" class="mandatory-mark">'*'</abbr>' are mandatory
sign-up.legal-information: By signing in, you allow Pix to store your data. They will be kept for a maximum of 5 years, starting with your last sign in date, and will then be archived according to statutory limitation periods (5 years). They are only used by Pix and Pix's service providers. In accordance to the law « informatique et libertés », you can exercise your right of access to data and correct them by sending an email to dpd@pix.fr.

skill-review.title: Result
skill-review.already-shared: Thank you, your results have been sent!
skill-review.archived:
This route has been archived by the organizer.
Sending results is no longer possible but they are taken into account in your route.

details.title: Your detailed results
details.skill-progress:
'

'You have validated '

'{percentage}%'

' of the skill {skill}.'

'

skill-review.information: If you've ridden on Pix before, the questions you answered weren't asked again. However, the result displayed here takes into account all of your answers.
skill-review.not-finished: You cannot send your results yet, we still have a few questions for you.
skill-review.send-results: Send your results to the course organizer so that he can accompany you.

time-gauge.remaining-time-placeholder: There is still time left to complete the test

page0.title: You can look up the Internet for information
page0.explanation:
If you don't know the answer to a question,
it must be somewhere on the Internet.

page1.title: No time limit !
page1.explanation:
Take the time you need to complete your test. 
If a question has a time limit, you will be notified.

page2.title: Tutorials to help you learn
page2.explanation:
Go through tutorials to learn more 
about each question and improve.

page3.title: An adaptative level of difficulty
page3.explanation:
According to your answers, 
Pix will adapt the level of difficulty of upcoming questions.

tutorial-panel.title: To succeed next time
tutorial-panel.info: These links were recommended by Pix users.

fill-in-campaign-code.title: I have a code
fill-in-campaign-code.description:
This code allows you to start a course'
'or to send your profile to an organization.

errors.forbidden: Oops! We can't find you. Check your information to continue or notify the organizer.
errors.not-found: Your code is wrong, please check or contact the organizer.

fill-in-certificate-verification-code.title: Verifier une certification
fill-in-certificate-verification-code.description: La certification Pix atteste d’un niveau de maitrise des compétences numériques, reconnu par l’État et le monde professionnel.
fill-in-certificate-verification-code.label: Code de vérification (P-XXXXXXXX)

errors.missing-code: Veuillez saisir un code au format P-XXXXXXXX.
errors.not-found: Il n'y a pas de certificat Pix correspondant
errors.unallowed-access: Merci de renseigner le code de vérification au format P-XXXXXXXX dans le champ ci-dessus.

shared-certification.title: Partage de certificat
shared-certification.back-link: Retour à la saisie du code de vérification

fill-in-id-pix.title: Enter my username
fill-in-id-pix.announcement: The organizer needs the following information to be able to accompany you :

warning.instructions: You will have ''{time}'' to answer the next question.
warning.further-instructions: You can continue answering afterwards but the answer will not be considered as correct.
